text: Apologies for the #powercut in #Bristol #BS31 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 14:00. Drew
Apologies for the #powercut in #Crediton #EX17 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 14:00. Drew
We are aware of a #powercut in the #Penzance #TR20 and surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 02:00. Andi.
We are aware of a #powercut in the #Pontypool #NP4 and surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 22:00. Andi.
We are aware of a #powercut in the #Hayle #Camborne #TR27 #TR14 and surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 21:30. Andi.
All customers affected by the #powercut in the #Mansfield #NG20 area now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Mansfield #NG20 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 03:00. Andi.
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Plympton #PL7 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Drew
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #WR10 #Pershore area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Plympton #PL7 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 23:00. Drew
We are aware that properties are without power in #LE67 #Coalville area. We aim to restore all supplies by 21:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut  Siân
Apologies for the ongoing #powercut affecting #Pershore #WR10 our engineers continue to work on the fault and are now estimating to have power restored by 22:30
is currently a #powercut in #WR10 #Pershore & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 15:30.  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Chesterfield #S42 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience. David.
We are sorry about the #powercut in #Chesterfield #S42 & surrounding areas. Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 07:00. Ellie
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Hereford #HR9 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Ellie
We are aware that properties are without power in #Hereford #HR9 area. We aim to restore all supplies by 04:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut Ellie
All supplies to #Wells #BA5 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut. Ellie
Apologies for the delay in restoring power due to the #powercut. We've got most supplies back on in #BA5 #Wells, but are working to restore the remaining properties by approximately 01:30  Siân
We are aware that properties are without power in #Wells #BA5 and surrounding areas. We aim to restore all supplies by 23:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut  Siân
